rows.label: tev900391_MSG0010
rows.name: Hey there... How's it poppin'?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0020
rows.name:
Huh? Me? Oh, I'm currently on the lam
from the hardships of celebrity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0030
rows.name:
...It's like everywhere I go in NLA, there's
folks wanting handshakes or autographs...
Like, what am I, a Hollywood star?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0040
rows.name:
Ugh, remind me to dropkick whoever decided
to put me up on this damn pedestal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0050
rows.name: You know what I'm talkin' about, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0060
rows.name: Admonish

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0070
rows.name:
Tell him it's the hero's role
to raise morale.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0080
rows.name:
Oh, gimme a break...
Vandham said the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0090
rows.name:
I was drifting for months through the
vastness of space! Where's my reward for
that? Can I not get a little sympathy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0100
rows.name:
On that note, hang out with me, will you?
There's only so much alone time a guy
can endure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0110
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0120
rows.name: Say he clearly needs time to adjust.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0130
rows.name:
There, I knew you'd get it.
I'm lucky to have a clever pal like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0140
rows.name:
On that note, buddy, let's hang out.
I've got some time to kill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0150
rows.name:
So, what's there to do around here?
I'm good with anything, so long as it
passes the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0160
rows.name: Suggest Cards

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0170
rows.name:
Challenge him to a high-stakes
game of poker.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0180
rows.name:
Ooh, now there's an answer after my own
heart! You sure know how to party![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0190
rows.name:
I'll warn you though, me and Lady Luck
are old friends, okay? Don't come crying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0200
rows.name:
I've been known to send Doug home
in his tighty-whities, and I'm not saying
once or twice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0210
rows.name:
Now, of course, if Princess finds out,
she'll rake me over the coals or worse...
But that just adds to the thrill, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0220
rows.name:
Win or lose, sink or swim,
double or bust... I'm sure
as hell having fun tonight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0230
rows.name: Invite to a Diner

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0240
rows.name: Invite him to go hang out at a diner.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0250
rows.name:
Hmm... A diner, huh? Now that you
mention it, I really could go for a
steaming big cup of greasy-spoon joe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0260
rows.name:
It'd also be a good chance for you to
tell me about all the fun stuff you've
been getting up to on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0270
rows.name:
According to the rumor mill,
your exploits would put the old-school
Hollywood blockbusters to shame![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0280
rows.name:
If even half of what they say is true,
they should really make YOU the hero
and let me retire in damn peace already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0290
rows.name:
...Hey, cool itâ€”I'm just yankin' your chain.
Quit with the scowling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0300
rows.name:
All right, all right, how about this?
I'll pay for the coffee this time. Hope
they make it strong and bitter, like me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0310
rows.name: Extol Joys of Labor

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0320
rows.name: Say that you could do some BLADE work.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0330
rows.name:
Someone's a little worker bee!
So Princess drilled that stuff into you too.
She's a hard gal to work for, that one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0340
rows.name:
You've gotta get your rest when
you can. Can't perform your duties
when your head's not in the game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0350
rows.name:
If you're finding it hard to stand up to the
Princess, want me to talk to her for you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0360
rows.name:
...No? I gotcha. Sorry, didn't mean
to stick my nose in your business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0370
rows.name:
But hey, if there's ever anything
bothering you, you tell me, all right?
Least I can do is be a sounding board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0380
rows.name:
...Hang on, what were we
talking about, again?[ST:wait ]
